attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to initiate an independent analysis into chemical trails, especially from high altitude aircraft, and make fully public the findings. More details
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of this earth. Have the right to know what is being sprayed over our lands. We have the right to know what enviromental or heath impact it has on all living organisms on our planet. We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to initiate an independent analysis into chemical trails, especially from high altitude aircraft, and make fully public the findings.
